commit message:
Updated license documents
The project is now licensed under the GPLv3.  This is required for
compatibility with the OUYA support libraries which are licensed under the
Apache License v2.
Added to license documentation the URL to the ODK
front: Expanded diagnostics, separated some utilities into new class.
front: Little tweak to diagnostic output.

front: Fixed unnavigable path preference
On first install, if the user did not have the folder [sdcard]/roms/n64 on
their device, then they were unable to navigate the path preference to
select a ROM.

cleanup: Updated all java header comments to GPL v3.

Jautodoc preferences in ./guidelines/config_files/

front: Updated PathPreference to follow standard pattern more closely.

TODO: Still a bug on rotation with the dialog open. Previously,
rotating the screen produced an empty dialog.  Now the dialog is pop-
ulated, but always returns to the initial directory.

bugfix: PathPreference dialog retains state on rotation.

Pulled my hair out on this one, and it's still kind of a hack...
Unbelievably difficult to do the simplest of things sometimes.
front: Changed version string in preparation for publishing update 2.0.1
